description: Try our easy to follow Salmon & Avocado Tartlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cold canapés,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Avocado,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Salmon & Avocado Tartlets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g smoked salmon slices, cut into strips
1 large avocado, seeded and chopped finely

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 8cm rounds from each pastry sheet. Press into patty pans. You can do these in batches, keeping remaining pastry rounds in fridge until needed.
Bake for about 12 minutes until golden and crisp. Repeat with remaining pastry. Cool.
Meanwhile, combine avocado, tomato, onion and chives in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Using a teaspoon, fill the cooked pastry cases with some of the avocado mixture. Top with salmon strips and drizzle with a little lemon juice.
